field.name: DCMI Resource Type

definition.attribution: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set, Version 1.1: Reference Description at http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/

field.definition: The nature or genre of the resource.

levelAndDeftn.levelDeftn: the nature or genre of the content of the resource

terms.termAndDeftn: data encoded in a defined structure
a visual representation other than text.
a resource requiring interaction from the user to be understood, executed, or experienced
a series of visual representations imparting an impression of motion when shown in succession
an inanimate, three-dimensional object or substance
a system that provides one or more functions
a computer program in source or compiled form
a resource primarily intended to be heard
a resource consisting primarily of words for reading

dos.practice: Select a value from the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative controlled vocabulary (included here).
Includes terms describing general categories, functions, genres, or aggregation levels for content.

Some digital objects may involve more than one type, e.g., a manuscript collection may have text, image, sound, and interactive components. Use separate Type elements to enter multiple types or clearly separate each entry by a semicolon and a space within an element.
